title: Runes and Mastery page re-order
body:
hi all,
please feel free to chip in here and tell riot how much you want this.
however I'm not sure if I'm posting it in the right section.

I would very much like to be able to drag and drop the order of my runes and masteries pages.

So for example my current Jungle and Support Rune pages are at the top of the list and my Mastery pages for both are at the bottom.

it just feels bad not being able to change the order easily, especially in Normals when there are barnies over position or in Aram when someone begs a trade in the last few seconds and you need to change very quickly and end up with the wrong page... or in ranked too if you just straight up forget to change it and notice at the last moment.

Cheers,
mugz

edit : english

replies.body: Sounds like an awesome idea, simple yet effective {{summoner:31}}
good idea but waste of time for riot, if you have been playing for a long time this shouldnt be a problem.

they are working on the client and UI at the moment. YAY.
*bump*

30 minutes re-ordering pages from screenshots.

Please riot, there is a better way.

thanks, I thought so :)

cmon guys I see plenty of views but nobody is using the poll. I put it there so you don't have to post. I pretty much fed the simple task of feedback to you on a silver spoon and you are still too lazy... haha.

please use the poll.
